author: Tom Fletcher, Tom Fletcher
title: A letter from the future about how we handled the coronavirus pandemic
content:
Your dad asked me to tell you about the Great Pandemic of 2020. Hard to believe it was 30 years ago. 
At the time there was an American president who called it a Chinese virus, because it started there. But unlike the virus, that didnt catch on. I cant remem… [+5493 chars]
